name: TerminologyCapabilities.purpose
title: TerminologyCapabilities.purpose
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Why this terminology capabilities is defined
element.definition: Explanation of why this terminology capabilities is needed and why it has been designed as it has.
element.comment: This element does not describe the usage of the terminology capabilities. Instead, it provides traceability of ''why'' the resource is either needed or ''why'' it is defined as it is.  This may be used to point to source materials or specifications that drove the structure of this terminology capabilities.
